name: conduit-rxjs
description: A JavaScript library for architecting user interfaces with RxJS and React.

scripts.release-patch: npm version patch && git push origin master --tags && npm publish --access=public
scripts.release-minor: npm version minor && git push origin master --tags && npm publish --access=public
scripts.release-major: npm version major && git push origin master --tags && npm publish --access=public

author: Chris Basham <csbasham@iu.edu>
